title: Best of Business Card Design 8 (Rockport)
content:
My fellow typophiles,

We’re currently accepting entries for Rockport’s Best of Business Card Design 8. The deadline is coming up very soon, so please don’t hesitate. The call for entries can be found here: [http://www.rockpub.com/entries.asp?id=73](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907044717/http:/www.rockpub.com/entries.asp?id=73 "http://www.rockpub.com/entries.asp?id=73")

For questions, comments, concerns, please use our toll-free email — [enries@spdaustin.com](mailto:enries@spdaustin.com).

Thanks!  
Oscar

 [‹ [brand] A New Logo for Italy](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907044717/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31795 "Go to previous forum topic") [Studying Design Abroad ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907044717/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31565 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Oscar Morris

comments.content: Do u guys accept student entries? I mean the spec works?

Apologies for the spam flavored post. But yeah—we need the enrtries.

Satya, professional work only, please.

“Do u guys accept student entries? I mean the spec works?”

I’d say most publications do. Just don’t mark it as such. ;o)
